root.name: Mr Bean
root.description: OverviewThe video game is based from the animated TV series of the same name. You play as Mr Bean, the main character as he tries to find his teddy bear simply called Teddy.There are 12 levels to encounter and lots of puzzles and crazy traps may occur. You can make Mr Bean dressed as a pirate to power him up.Fight your way through multiple enemies by using a frying pan while navigates through 3D levels.Unlock exclusive clips from the TV series.
